in pradhana karuna mulu lokayema aarthikaya dawantha arbudakari thaththwayakata madiwa sitiyadi shri lanka maha bankuwa labha labimaya.deka me dawantha labhaya gananaya kara aththe, grisiye bandumkarawala aayojanayen siduwu paduwa piyawimen pasuwa wimaya.lokaye siyaluma maha bankuwala sanchitha kalamanakaranaya ha sasanda balanawita me labhaya ihalama thana ganna bawa da wartha we.kolambaa wishwawidyalaye wisheshagnyayin kipadenakugen sadumlath kandayamak wisin sidukala samikshanayakata anuwa, 2011 wasaredi shri lanka maha bankuwa thama widesha sanchitha aayojanaya haraha upaya athi labhaya sanchithaye prathishathayak lesa siyayata 6.6k bawa prakasha kota thibe.shri lanka maha bankuwa wartha kala me dawantha labhaya prathishathayak washayenuth, mudal washayenuth amerikawe fedaral risarw bankuwa (ui jchchchaeemba achicharuch ooeewm) athpath karagath labhaya ikmawa yana bawada samikshakayo pawasathi.ee anuwa wasara 2011 di shri lanka maha bankuwa, thama samanya widesha sanchitha wana a. do. biliyana 6.5 yodawamin rupiyal koti 5547 (a. do. miliyana 430) labhayak enam siyayata 6.6ka prathishatha labhayak labagena atha.
nam godak hondayi.

polisiya pawasanne wedi praharaya ella wu gini awiya ema niwasa aasannaye padinchi polis kosthapalwarayekuge bawayi.wedi wadima siduwana awasthawedi polis kosthapalwaraya niwase sita nomathi athara siddhiya sala wu wahapamini ohu gini awiya sangawimatath katayuthu kara athi bawa wimarshanawaladi heliwi thibenawa.siddhiya sambandhayen athadanguwata gath dedena balapitiya mahesthrath adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen anathuruwa paya 48k randawagena prashna kirimata polisiyata awasara himiwuna.miyagiya tharunayage mawa apa samaga sandahan kale thama puthraya thamanta tharjana athi bawata mita pera awasthawakadida prakasha kara thibu bawayi.
